CheckTitle: Ensure Inbound Anti-Spam Policies Have Empty AllowedSenderDomains
Description: Checks if AllowedSenderDomains is empty for all Hosted Content Filter Policies.
Risk: If AllowedSenderDomains is not empty, unwanted or risky senders may bypass anti-spam protections.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Microsoft 365 Defender (https://security.microsoft.com). 2. Expand Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies. 3. Under Policies, select Anti-spam. 4. Edit each policy and clear the AllowedSenderDomains.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure AllowedSenderDomains is empty for all Hosted Content Filter Policies unless there is a specific, justified need.

Notes: This check validates that AllowedSenderDomains is empty for all Hosted Content Filter Policies.
